languages.text: "Перед тем как бросить Дом, Тисифона передала свой Атлас преемнику — недавно родившемуся дитя! Мы не могли позволить ставленнице тиранши занять трон Дома. Тисифона была хитрой и коварной и наверняка продумала все наперед — свое исчезновение, ребенка, передачу поводка. Мы боялись, что однажды она возродится в теле Кассии. И не могли этого допустить".

traits.locale_text: "Перед тем, как бросить Дом, Тисифона передала свой Атлас преемнику — недавно родившемуся дитя! Мы не могли позволить ставленнице тиранши занять трон Дома. Тисифона была хитрой и коварной — и наверняка все продумала — свое исчезновение, ребенка, передачу поводка. Мы боялись, что однажды она возродится в теле Кассии. И не могли этого допустить".

languages.text: "Tisiphone passed her Atlas on to her successor before fleeing the House — to a newborn child! We could not surrender the throne to the tyrant's creature. Tisiphone was cunning and treacherous, she must have hatched the entire plan beforehand — her disappearance, the child, the transfer of the leash. We feared that one day she would be reborn in Cassia's body. And we could not let that happen."
languages.original_text: "Перед тем как бросить Дом, Тисифона передала свой Атлас преемнику — недавно родившемуся дитя! Мы не могли позволить ставленнице тиранши занять трон Дома. Тисифона была хитрой и коварной и наверняка продумала все наперед — свое исчезновение, ребенка, передачу поводка. Мы боялись, что однажды она возродится в теле Кассии. И не могли этого допустить".

traits.locale_text: "Tisiphone passed her Atlas on to the successor before fleeing the House — to a newly born child! We could not surrender the throne to the tyrant's creature. Tisiphone was cunning and treacherous and must have hatched the entire plan beforehand — her disappearance, the child, the transfer of the leash. We feared she would be reborn in Cassia's body some day. And could not let this happen."

Tisiphone was cunning and treacherous and must have hatched the entire plan beforehand — her disappearance, the child, the transfer of the leash. We feared she would be reborn in Cassia's body some day. And could not let this happen."

Tisiphone was cunning and treacherous, she must have hatched the entire plan beforehand — her disappearance, the child, the transfer of the leash. We feared that one day she would be reborn in Cassia's body. And we could not let that happen."

languages.text: “提西福涅在逃离家族之前，把她的圣仪传给了她的继承者——一个刚刚出生的孩子！我们绝对不能把王位交给那个暴君留下的怪物。提西福涅是个狡猾奸诈的家伙，所有的一切，无论是她的失踪、那个孩子，还是那条枷锁的易主，肯定都是她事先策划好的。我们担心有朝一日，她会借助卡西娅的肉体重生。我们决不能允许这种情况发生。”
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone passed her Atlas on to her successor before fleeing the House — to a newborn child! We could not surrender the throne to the tyrant's creature. Tisiphone was cunning and treacherous, she must have hatched the entire plan beforehand — her disappearance, the child, the transfer of the leash. We feared that one day she would be reborn in Cassia's body. And we could not let that happen."

traits.locale_text: “提西福涅在逃离家族之前，把她的圣仪传给了她的继承者——一个刚刚出生的孩子！我们绝对不能把王位交给那个暴君留下的怪物。提西福涅是个狡猾奸诈的家伙，所有的一切，无论是她的失踪、那个孩子，还是那条枷锁的易主，肯定都是她事先策划好的。我们担心有朝一日，她会借助卡西娅的肉体重生。我们决不能允许这种情况发生。”

languages.text: «Tisiphone legó su Atlas a su sucesora antes de abandonar su casa. ¡A una niña recién nacida! No podíamos entregar el trono a la creación de esa tirana. Tisiphone era astuta y traicionera. Debió de urdir el plan entero de antemano: su desaparición, la niña, el traspaso de la correa... Temíamos que algún día renacería en el cuerpo de Cassia. No podíamos permitirlo».
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone passed her Atlas on to her successor before fleeing the House — to a newborn child! We could not surrender the throne to the tyrant's creature. Tisiphone was cunning and treacherous, she must have hatched the entire plan beforehand — her disappearance, the child, the transfer of the leash. We feared that one day she would be reborn in Cassia's body. And we could not let that happen."

traits.locale_text: «Tisiphone legó su Atlas a su sucesora antes de abandonar su casa. ¡A una niña recién nacida! No podíamos entregar el trono a la creación de esa tirana. Tisiphone era astuta y traicionera. Debió de urdir el plan entero de antemano: su desaparición, la niña, el traspaso de la correa... Temíamos que algún día renacería en el cuerpo de Cassia. No podíamos permitirlo».

languages.text: 「ティシフォンは家を去る前にアトラスを後継者に譲った…新しく生まれたばかりの子供にね！私達は、王位を暴君の生物に明け渡すわけにはいかなかった。ティシフォンは狡猾で不誠実者だった。彼女は事前にすべての計画を練っていたに違いない…彼女の失踪、子供、鎖の譲渡。私たちは、いつか彼女がカシアの体に生まれ変わるのではないかと恐れていた。そうさせるわけにはいかなかった」
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone passed her Atlas on to her successor before fleeing the House — to a newborn child! We could not surrender the throne to the tyrant's creature. Tisiphone was cunning and treacherous, she must have hatched the entire plan beforehand — her disappearance, the child, the transfer of the leash. We feared that one day she would be reborn in Cassia's body. And we could not let that happen."

traits.locale_text: 「ティシフォンは家を去る前にアトラスを後継者に譲った…新しく生まれたばかりの子供にね！私達は、王位を暴君の生物に明け渡すわけにはいかなかった。ティシフォンは狡猾で不誠実者だった。彼女は事前にすべての計画を練っていたに違いない…彼女の失踪、子供、鎖の譲渡。私たちは、いつか彼女がカシアの体に生まれ変わるのではないかと恐れていた。そうさせるわけにはいかなかった」

languages.text: "Tisiphone hat ihren Atlas auf ihre Nachfolgerin übertragen, bevor sie aus dem Hause floh – auf ein neugeborenes Kind! Wir konnten den Thron nicht der Kreatur der Tyrannin überlassen. Tisiphone war raffiniert und hinterhältig und muss den gesamten Plan vorher ausgeheckt haben – ihr Verschwinden, das Kind, die Übergabe der Fessel. Wir fürchteten, dass sie eines Tages in Cassias Körper wiedergeboren wird. Und das durfte nicht passieren."
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone passed her Atlas on to her successor before fleeing the House — to a newborn child! We could not surrender the throne to the tyrant's creature. Tisiphone was cunning and treacherous, she must have hatched the entire plan beforehand — her disappearance, the child, the transfer of the leash. We feared that one day she would be reborn in Cassia's body. And we could not let that happen."

traits.locale_text: "Tisiphone hat ihren Atlas auf ihre Nachfolgerin übertragen, bevor sie aus dem Hause floh – auf ein neugeborenes Kind! Wir konnten den Thron nicht der Kreatur der Tyrannin überlassen. Tisiphone war raffiniert und hinterhältig und muss den gesamten Plan vorher ausgeheckt haben – ihr Verschwinden, das Kind, die Übergabe der Fessel. Wir fürchteten, dass sie eines Tages in Cassias Körper wiedergeboren wird. Und das durfte nicht passieren."

languages.text: « Avant de fuir sa maison, Tisiphone a transmis son Atlas à sa successeure... qui n'était encore qu'un nouveau-né ! Il était hors de question que nous laissions la créature de ce tyran monter sur le trône. Tisiphone était rusée et perfide, nul doute qu'elle avait déjà tout prévu : sa disparition, l'Enfant, le transfert de la laisse... Nous craignions qu'elle ne ressuscite un jour dans le corps de Cassia. Il en était hors de question. »
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone passed her Atlas on to her successor before fleeing the House — to a newborn child! We could not surrender the throne to the tyrant's creature. Tisiphone was cunning and treacherous, she must have hatched the entire plan beforehand — her disappearance, the child, the transfer of the leash. We feared that one day she would be reborn in Cassia's body. And we could not let that happen."

traits.locale_text: « Avant de fuir sa maison, Tisiphone a transmis son Atlas à sa successeure... qui n'était encore qu'un nouveau-né ! Il était hors de question que nous laissions la créature de ce tyran monter sur le trône. Tisiphone était rusée et perfide, nul doute qu'elle avait déjà tout prévu : sa disparition, l'enfant, le transfert de la laisse... Nous craignions qu'elle ne ressuscite un jour dans le corps de Cassia. Il en était hors de question. »

languages.text: "Tisiphone, Hane'den kaçıp gitmeden önce Atlas'ını vârisine, yeni doğmuş bir çocuğa emanet etti! Tahtı tiranın yaratığına teslim edemezdik. Tisiphone kurnaz bir haindi, her şeyi en baştan planlamış olmalı. Ortadan kayboluşu, çocuk, tasmayla iplerin onun eline geçişi. Bir gün Cassia'nın bedeninde yeniden doğmasından korktuk. Bunun olmasına izin veremezdik."
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone passed her Atlas on to her successor before fleeing the House — to a newborn child! We could not surrender the throne to the tyrant's creature. Tisiphone was cunning and treacherous, she must have hatched the entire plan beforehand — her disappearance, the child, the transfer of the leash. We feared that one day she would be reborn in Cassia's body. And we could not let that happen."

traits.locale_text: "Tisiphone, Hane'den kaçıp gitmeden önce Atlas'ını vârisine emanet etti. Yeni doğmuş bir çocuğa! Tahtı tiranın yaratığına teslim edemezdik. Tisiphone kurnaz bir haindi, her şeyi en baştan planlamış olmalı. Ortadan kayboluşu, çocuk, tasmanın iplerinin onun eline geçişi. Bir gün Cassia'nın bedeninde yeniden doğmasından korktuk. Bunun olmasına izin veremezdik."
